name: Go Higher!
description:
This is a simple game in which you use your rifle to stop falling stones, in order to jump over them to get as high as possible.

On your way, you will encounter monsters that you can kill with your gun and bonuses that, when shot down and collected, will help you survive and get higher.

There are 43 achievements available to unlock in the game

Controls:

A, D or arrows - Move

Space bar or RMB - Jump

LMB - Shooting

R - Quick Restart

F1 - Full screen

Credits:

Programming, graphics etc.

Kasztan

Sounds:

https://freesound.org/

Music:

https://freesound.org/people/Cebuana/sounds/250754/

If you find any bugs, let me know about them.

Good luck :)
